title: Help my account has been hacked!!!
body: I cant log in on client,,,i only play L.O.L on MY laptop only & never play on anyone device. I check the LoL website if im still log in in there luckily im still log in & check my account but when i see the "current email" use is different on the one i use before. i cant change email now since its asking for pass to do that while when i tried "forgot password" they sent it to "current email" used which i never use before. PLS help.
